title: Towel, 1920–29
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; ends finished with overhand knots of warp clipped at the base of the knot with no fringe; warp over spun, Z-twist
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 93 x 31 cm (36 5/8 x 12 3/16 in.)
description: Towel with a six-inch band of colored pattern at one end and a narrower band at the other end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1920–29. Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; ends finished with overhand knots of warp clipped at the base of the knot with no fringe; warp over spun, Z-twist. 1974-92-4.
